text: Tony Rome is a 1967 American mystery movie directed by Gordon Douglas and was based on the 1960 novel Miami Mayhem by Marvin H. Albert. It stars Frank Sinatra, Jill St. John, Sue Lyon, Gena Rowlands, Simon Oakland, Richard Conte, Robert J. Wilke and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was followed in 1968 by Lady in Clement. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 movies Category:1960s mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Gordon Douglas
title: Tony Rome
